item.title: Windows下的brew工具 scoop
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: 官方文档 buckets 常用 buckets scoop bucket add extras scoop bucket add nirsoft add this repository as a bucket to Scoop: $ scoop bucket add openscoop http://github.com/kiedtl/open-scoop.git $ scoop bucket list rsync: http://rsync.samba.org/ scoop bucket add rsync https://github.com/rivy/scoop-bucket java: https://github.com/ScoopInstaller/Java scoop bucket add java https://github.com/ScoopInstaller/Java Prerequisites To get to the PowerShell prompt "Start" --> (Search) "cmd" Terminal window should appear "powershell" Prompt should now start with "PS
